price: 3. Woo mari usun salat soolisaah Rizqhik keenih neceem ken kah amrisnecmih yacee mara.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
